Title: fuseiso: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in fuseiso, the worst of
    which could result in the arbitrary execution of code.

Background.Text: FuseISO is a FUSE module to mount ISO filesystem images (.iso, .nrg, .bin, .mdf and .img files).

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in fuseiso. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted ISO file using fuseiso, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All fuseiso users should upgrade to the latest version:
